name: 街头英雄 Street Heroes
description: 精心打造的一款休闲卡牌类写实风硬派3D格斗游戏。收集卡组、摸索搭配、无限连招、绝杀大技、全屏华丽特效，带给你前所未有的畅快游戏体验！
minimum_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
